snippet.title: RE:Pik 3 Deluxe | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Download the demo here!
https://sites.google.com/view/mrtongwah/home

My discord server:
https://discord.gg/cBUtYxUrmS

RE:Pik 3 Deluxe is an alternate version of Pikmin 3 where the Koppaites we know of did not suffer a food crisis. After the events of Pikmin 4, some time after everybody returned home, Olimar's Wife wanted to go on a vacation with him after he was done working a delivery shift, she decided to leave the kids and bulbie with another relative, and she set off to space with a ship that the President's wife had on the side. The plan was for her and Olimar to spend a getaway alone, only for her to crash land on PNF-404...  Captain Olimar and the President, (Forced to go by his wife to retrieve the spare  spaceship) set off to the planet to rescue her. Louie is there too...
